results.title: Stargate for Game Boy
results.creator_credit: Acclaim Entertainment Ltd and Beam Software
results.material_description: Cartridge videogame. Cartridge and manual in cardboard box
results.brief_description:
Ra, the vicious alien ruler of Abydos, is using Stargates find resource-rich worlds to conquer and enslave its inhabitants. Only the player can stop Ra by cracking the Stargates’ codes and closing them before they can be misused. Stargate, while based on the action sci-fi franchise, is a matching puzzle game, similar to Tetris but with a 3D aspect. Tiles are dropped into a Stargate and matching three tiles with the same symbol clears the tiles. The game is lost when too many tiles fill up the space.

Adding complexity is the “address”, a set of seven symbols across the top of the screen that the player must clear by stacking three tiles of that symbol. The game features two modes. Skill Mode has the player clearing addresses before the tiles fill up. The game’s speed increases as more and more addresses are cleared. In Battle Mode, a player can play against the computer or another player via a link cable to another handheld. Clearing stacks adds them to your opponent’s field, hopefully overwhelming them and winning the match.

results.title: Starbreaker
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Roman Kroitor and Bruce Mackay
results.brief_description: A science fiction story about two children who crash land their spacecraft on an unknown planet. They are captured by a wizard who rules over a lifeless land. As the story evolves the youngsters realise that the wizard, in his own way, is also a prisoner. A conflict between the protagonists leads to the wizard’s discovery of music and harmony, which ultimately prove to be the keys that spring the trap.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Roman Kroitor and Bruce Mackay
results.description: A science fiction story about two children who crash land their spacecraft on an unknown planet. They are captured by a wizard who rules over a lifeless land. As the story evolves the youngsters realise that the wizard, in his own way, is also a prisoner. A conflict between the protagonists leads to the wizard’s discovery of music and harmony, which ultimately prove to be the keys that spring the trap.
description_for_label: A science fiction story about two children who crash land their spacecraft on an unknown planet. They are captured by a wizard who rules over a lifeless land. As the story evolves the youngsters realise that the wizard, in his own way, is also a prisoner. A conflict between the protagonists leads to the wizard’s discovery of music and harmony, which ultimately prove to be the keys that spring the trap.

results.title: Star wars. Ep. 1: The Phantom menace [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Lucasfilm, Ltd., Rick McCallum and George Lucas
results.brief_description: Another instalment in the “Star Wars” series - with a difference - director George Lucas choosing to trace what happened prior to the “original” “Star Wars” film, rather than following on from “The Return of the Jedi”. Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor), a young Jedi knight, is training under his mentor, Qui-Gon Jinn (Liam Neeson). When the planet Naboo is cut off by the Trade Federation, the Jedi Council orders Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon to settle the problem. They arrive in Naboo and meet Queen Amidala (Natalie Portman) who joins them on the trip to Coruscant to meet the Trade Federation. Unfortunately, they encounter difficulties with their spacecraft and are forced to make an emergency landing on Tatooine. While there, they meet Anakin Skywalker (Jake Lloyd), a slave boy, who will eventually father Luke Skywalker and become known as Darth Vader. Qui-Gon becomes convinced that Anakin is the leader the Jedi’s have been seeking and makes a bet to free Anakin from the slave contract he is bound to. On return to Naboo, war breaks out and the Jedi’s must fight against Darth Sidious (Ian McDiarmid), leader of the Trade Federation and his deadly henchman, dark Jedi, Darth Maul (Ray Park). One of the most anticipated films of the 90s, “The Phantom menace” includes cameo roles from Samuel L. Jackson and Terence Stamp.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lucasfilm, Ltd., Rick McCallum and George Lucas
results.description: Another instalment in the “Star Wars” series - with a difference - director George Lucas choosing to trace what happened prior to the “original” “Star Wars” film, rather than following on from “The Return of the Jedi”. When the planet Naboo is cut off by the Trade Federation, the Jedi Council orders Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon to settle the problem. While there, they meet Anakin Skywalker (Jake Lloyd), a slave boy, who will eventually father Luke Skywalker and become known as Darth Vader. Qui-Gon becomes convinced that Anakin is the leader the Jedi’s have been seeking and makes a bet to free Anakin from the slave contract he is bound to. On return to Naboo, war breaks out and the Jedi’s must fight against Darth Sidious (Ian McDiarmid), leader of the Trade Federation and his deadly henchman, dark Jedi, Darth Maul (Ray Park). One of the most anticipated films of the 90s, “The Phantom menace” includes cameo roles from Samuel L. Jackson and Terence Stamp.

Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor), a young Jedi knight, is training under his mentor, Qui-Gon Jinn (Liam Neeson). When the planet Naboo is cut off by the Trade Federation, the Jedi Council orders Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon to settle the problem. One of the most anticipated films of the 90s, “The Phantom menace” includes cameo roles from Samuel L. Jackson and Terence Stamp.

results.title: Star Wars Yoda Stories for Game Boy Color
results.creator_credit: THQ, Lucasfilm, Ltd. and Torus Games
results.material_description: Cartridge videogame. Cartridge and manual in cardboard box
results.brief_description: Despite being based off of the Star Wars universe, Star Wars: Yoda Stories lacks a central plot or definitive goal. Instead, the game is designed to be infinitely playable in short bursts, where goals are randomly generated and the levels are procedurally made. Despite the variety, the game always starts the same, where the player, as Luke Skywalker, arrives at Dagobah in an X-Wing. Goals are then given by Yoda after he is found.
results.title_for_label: Star Wars Yoda Stories for Game Boy Color

results.title: Star wars (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Princess Leia is captured by the evil imperial forces in their efforts to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing space captain Han Solo team together with the lovable Droids C-3PO and R2D2 to restore justice to the universe.

results.title: Star Wars
results.creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Lucasfilm, Ltd., Gary Kurtz and George Lucas
results.brief_description: A Long time ago in a galaxy far far away, George Lucas’s space adventure captured the hearts and imaginations of film lovers of all ages from the moment these words scrolled across the screen. The Empire’s evil Death Star must be destroyed. The heroes, Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo and a pair of droids named R2-D2 and C-3PO, as part of the Rebel Alliance, must pit their strength against the might of the Empire and the evil Jedi, Darth Vader. With the help of an old Jedi Knight, Obi-Wan Kenobi, they battle the forces of darkness and triumph. The special effects and famous “Star wars” theme music has ensured that this film takes its place in cinema history. Includes a ten minute interview between George Lucas and Leonard Maltin.

constellations_other.name: The Wilhelm scream, easters eggs and open world games
constellations_other.description: This Constellation tracks how an on-set in-joke became one of the first cinematic easter eggs. It was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Harrison Buikstra and Jasper Caverly.

results.title: Star trek: the motion picture
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Century Associates, Gene Roddenberry, Jon Povill and Robert Wise
results.brief_description: When a destructive space entity is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine, and hopefully stop it. With it’s relentless flight towards Earth “V’ger’s” bloody-minded pursuit to find it’s “Creator”, Kirk and crew face possible Armageddon. Cast also includes Persis Khambatta as Lieutenant Ilia and Stephen Collins as Commander Decker. Interesting note: When Spock travels through V’ger and sees all the incredible imagery, look out for Darth Vader and Miss Piggy - right after his line “Who or what are we dealing with?”. Written by Allen Dean Foster. Original music by Jerry Goldsmith. Cinematography by Richard H. Kline.

results.title: Star trek III: the search for Spock
results.creator_credit: Harve Bennett Productions, Harve Bennett and Leonard Nimoy
results.brief_description: The third in the series of feature films based on the original television series by Gene Roddenberry is set in the 23rd Century, the planet Genesis has been born, but at a great and terrible price - the death of Captain Spock. As per tradition, his body is consigned to deep space and the battered starship Enterprise limps back home. Lt. Saavik and Dr. David Marcus arrive on the forbidden planet to begin their research, unaware that their discoveries are also of great importance to the Klingon Battle Commander Kruge (played by Christopher Lloyd), who will stop at nothing to gain control of the secrets of this new world for the Klingon Empire. The revelations regarding Genesis will impel Captain Kirk and the Enterprise crew on a mission so personal and dangerous that they will have to confront the final frontiers of revolutionary science and the arcane rituals of Vulcan mysticism. Cast includes William Shatner, DeForest Kelly, James Doohan, George Takei, Walter Keonig, Nichelle Nichols, Merrit Butrick and actor/director Leonard Nimoy, around whom the whole story revolves.

results.title: Star trek II: the wrath of Khan
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Robert Sallin and Nicholas Meyer
results.brief_description: It is the 23rd century and the starship U.S.S. Enterprise is on a routine training mission when an urgent communication from Space Laboratory Regula One (home of the Genesis project), is received by Admiral James T Kirk. Kirk’s old enemy, Khan, a genetically enhanced human from the Eugenics War, has appropriated a top secret device named Project Genesis and is using the universe threatening device in a deadly game of revenge. Aided by his band of genetic supermen made possible by the Project, Khan gains control of a Federation Starship and begins a desperate mission to gain control of the Enterprise. Cast includes William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Kirstie Alley.

results.title: Star seekers
results.creator_credit: Fine Arts, Sterling Educational Films and John Wilson
results.brief_description: This film gives a rather brief and superficial account of man’s view of the universe. The Greek explanations in terms of the elements are discussed, as are the contributions and theories of Pythagoras, Ptolemy, Copernicus, Kepler, Newton and Kant. Also introduces the theories of Einstein and Hoyle.
